Drawing on the glamour of the ’80s, the design embraces a Sea Point landmark through a contemporary lens. From impeccable material choices to curated layouts and spaces, this development delivers a quiet kind of boldness – understated, yet impossible to ignore.

With nearly every apartment including a balcony or terrace, residents will enjoy exceptional views. Many front-facing units look out to the ocean, while others boast majestic outlooks towards Lion’s Head or Signal Hill – a triple-view offering right in the heart of Sea Point. Dear Jean also offers parking with select units, plus additional available to purchase – a rare convenience in Sea Point. The building is also pet-friendly, and there are curated furniture packs available from Bone Studio and The Beautiful Room by Newman.

AN INVESTMENT

That Works For You

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]Whether you’re buying to live, invest, or both, Dear Jean offers a compelling opportunity in one of Cape Town’s most sought-after suburbs. With short-term rentals permitted and a partnership with Propr, a leading rental management company, investors can enjoy hassle-free income potential while maintaining full control of their property.

Furniture packs from Bone Studio and The Beautiful Room by Newman are also available, ensuring your unit is rental-ready from day one.

The combination of an unbeatable location, superior finishes, and flexible layouts means high demand is expected, making Dear Jean a smart addition to any portfolio.[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn Make Dear Jean Yours

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”” text_direction=”default”]The online sales launch takes place at 1pm on Wednesday, 8 October 2025. To secure your preferred apartment, a reservation fee of R10,000 is required. Early buyers can also unlock a R200,000 launch discount on the reservation platform.

Make sure to get pre-qualified with your preferred bond originator ahead of time, it’s the easiest way to streamline your purchase.

Be proactive: shortlist your favourite apartments before launch day to increase your chances of securing the perfect home.[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=”large” open_new_tab=”true”
